title: How to Play NBA Hangtime on Nintendo 64

steps.headline: First, you may either create a player or enter your name.
steps.description: It is best to create a player because eventually he or she will improve.

steps.headline: Enter your name and pin at the home screen.
Pick your team and partner to play as.
steps.description: It's best to pick players that are good for your team. Try to get ones that will help give your team offense or defense. Don't go with only shooters or only defenders.

steps.headline: Now it's game time.
steps.description: This game requires you to use only 3 buttons on the controller. The buttons are A, down C, and right C.

steps.headline: To shoot, press the down C button, to dunk, hold A and run up to the hoop and press down C. The better your dunk rating, the better your dunks are and the farther away you can dunk from.
steps.description: It's easiest to make shots while holding down the A button while shooting. Right C is pass.

steps.headline: On defense, down C is to jump and block the ball.
steps.description: Right C is to swat the ball from a player. A and right C are to push the player, knocking him to the ground and sometimes making him lose the ball. A and down C are to jump high for a rebound. You can stop an opposing player's dunk by pushing the player as he is going for the dunk.
